#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

How to join the ai2009 project in your Eclipse


= Details =

1) Install svn plug-in to Eclipse, like "tigris.subversion", which I am using.

2) Open Eclipse, and specify any WorkSpace

3) *New* a project

4) *Select* "SVN: checkout projects from SVN", then *Click* "Next"

5) *Select* Create a new repository location, then *Click* "Next"

6) The Url should be "http://ai2009.googlecode.com/svn/trunk", which could also be checked from the "Source" tab above.

7) *Accept* the license

8) Put in your user name and password, which will be used to access the source code on Google. (check the Source tab above)

9) It will pop up a window with projects you can join. *Select* ai2009, and Eclipse will setup the new project for you.

10) Try to add or modify files, and submit codes with SVN commands
